mdRecord.dcterms:description: a group of institutions dedicated to music ... It consists of an amphitheater, a concert hall that can accommodate an audience of 800–1,000, a music museum containing an important collection of classical music instruments dating mainly from the fifteenth- to twentieth-century, a music library, exhibition halls and workshops. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cit%C3%A9_de_la_Musique [work]
